definition: the aperture of a wind instrument into which the player blows directly
details:
noun
- the aperture of a wind instrument into which the player blows directly
= synonyms: embouchure
- the tube of a pipe or cigarette holder that a smoker holds in the mouth
- an acoustic device
- (especially boxing) equipment that protects an athlete's mouth
= synonyms: gumshield
- a part that goes over or into the mouth of a person
= example: a part that goes over or into the mouth of a person
- a spokesperson (as a lawyer)
= synonyms: mouth
